about_the_game:
Cordels & Spells is a thrilling action roguelike inspired by the culture of cordel literature and set in 19th-century Ceará. Get ready to explore procedurally generated maps, face off against gangs of cangaceiros, and recover the Enchanted Cordels, magical artifacts that hold the history and essence of Cangasvale.

A Land Full of Magic and Danger

The region of Cangasvale has been overtaken by Ferrozé and his commanders, who spread chaos using the stolen cordels. You take on the role of Jesuino and Aurora Carcará, fearless warriors fighting to restore peace and preserve the rich culture of the sertanejo people.

Challenging Gameplay

  • Exploration and frantic combat: Engage in intense battles against treacherous enemies in ever-changing maps.

  • Choose your strategy: Carry up to three different weapons, combining melee and ranged attacks.

  • Permanent death: Every defeat means starting over, but each attempt makes you stronger.

  • Magical Cordels: Recover story fragments and collect legendary cordels inspired by Brazilian folklore.

A Journey Through the Northeast

Explore three distinct regions, each with unique challenges and landscapes:

  • Arid Sertão: Dry lands filled with cacti, where cangaceiros impose terror.

  • Mysterious Serra: Deep valleys and waterfalls hide dangerous enemies and valuable secrets.

  • Vibrant Coastline: Markets, beaches, and villages full of life and opportunities.

A Tribute to Northeastern Culture

With an aesthetic inspired by cordel literature and a soundtrack that echoes the roots of forró and baião, Verses and Spells is more than just a game – it's a celebration of Brazilian culture.

Are you ready to face Ferrozé and recover the stolen cordels? Grab your machete, gear up, and embark on this epic adventure through the heart of the sertão!
